WRITING.TEXT:
What gives the unborn the right to use another human's body? There is no other situation in which another person is allowed to use another's just because they'll die without it. One cannot be forced to give blood or organs, and those are much smaller feats than allowing a human to grow inside you and wreck your body from the inside out.
It's unethical to force a woman to carry a fetus to term, not unethical to end a life before it becomes one.

WRITING.TITLE: What's commonly socially acceptable, but also completely illegal?

WRITING.TEXT: I was talking about my experience with sexual assault, and she told me to stop lying and that rape was "tool of the patriarcy" and therefore a woman could not have done it, especially not to another woman.

You get out of there, honey. You get out, but it still hurts for a long, long time. You'll never be the same, and the sooner you stop chasing the girl you were before it happened, the sooner the pain dulls. You've got great thigns in you, they're just different things. Yeah, you aren't sweet anymore, you don't see good in the world anymore, and you don't really love anything anymore, but you find something to live for. It's this book you're writing. Yes, you write a book. You gotta keep going so you can write out the lives of these great people you make up. It helps you a lot, too. Takes your mind off things, helps you start to care again.
You meet a new guy, too. It hurts like hell when J leaves, but you're with someone better now. Don't miss him too much.
Also, fight like hell to get what you need. Don't drop it, bring it up every chance you can. We haven't got it yet, but you gotta fight.
Oh, and none of your freinds care when you come back home. Don't expect them too, it makes the pain worse. Everyone moved on, so you have to, too.
Good luck, and you can do it.
Also, you look *great* with purple hair in a couple years.
Of course. I was just making a point.
I've felt pretty fucking objectified by other women before. Just saying.

I will fuck whoever I want, goddamn it. If I enter into a hetero relationship... I entered into a hetero relationship. It doesn't mean anymore or less than than that. If I enter into a gay relationship... I entered into a gay relationship. Neither makes me anything other than (hopefully) in love. Oh, and bi. It makes me bi.
I'm an INFP myself.
Hell yeah! Everything about this is perfect.

Food. I've been bulimic since I was twelve and I relapsed on Christmas of last year. I've been stuck in it since then, and I waste so much food it's disgusting. I can't stop though. I'm only happy when I'm eating and it kills me a little.
You're welcome, I'm happy to help (:
I'm banned as well, but because I'm five foot two and less than ninety pounds :( I was kind of crushed when I found out there was a size requirment.

Firstly, I wouldn't have guessed English isn't your native language. It reads really smooth overall, and maybe more importantly, it's *interesting*. Reading it over, I want to know more. I really like your style (sentance structure, word choice, ect.)
The only thing I really notice is a few sentances seem like run-ons. Maybe separate "My hands shaking terribly on the steering wheeel, SLAM I go on the brakes" into two senttances.
Another thing is, occasionally, the wrong form of a word is used. "Breaks" means something is falling apart, "Brakes" are what are in a car. This is the only time it even hints that English isn't your native tongue. Hell, lots of native speaks do the same thing.
Also, thoughts don't need quotes, just italics.
Finally, I think you find the balance of description well. It's not too vague, nor is it over done, and the concept is fascinating. I'd love to hear more, and that's an amazing quality for writing to posess.
Just like it's a violation of autonomy to make someone keep a baby, it's a violation of autonomy top make them abort it.

I wonder the streets for a while, my rush turning to worry as I wonder if maybe she doesn't want me to find her.
Or if she's just too damn good at hiding.
Nonetheless, I cannot shake the image of her siren grin as she retreated into the crowd from my mind.
By now it's begun to rain, though the sun still shines, and I find myself swiping my dripping hair out of my eyes for the hundredth time.
I stop to rest against the corner of a shop and nearly jump out of my skin when I heard the husky, low voice in my ear.
"Hey there," she croons.
I whirl around to find myself facing Erin once more. She hangs upside-down from the eves elegant and smiling crookedly, smugly, her eyes dancing and her hair hanging down below her.
"What took you so long?" she asks, sliding her slender fingers across my cheek before executing a nimble flip off her perch and landing beside me.
I find myself gaping uselessly, unsure of what to say.
She walks a slow circle around me, trailing her fingers over my chest, my shoulders, and she smirks as she notices my racing heart.
In an instant, she's so close I can feel the heat of her body, the way she's toned so tight. A predator.
"Come with me, Holland." She enunciates my name in a delicious, sultry purr, the syllables rolling perfectly off her tongue. I am helpless to deny her request, and unable to find my voice.
I nod and she takes my wrist, pulling me along. She weaves through the crowd, her narrow but shapely hips swishing with a self-assured confidence I could never hope to possess and I find myself target to a few angry looks as she shoves a few people aside.
*I can''t control her* I want to tell them.
I have a feeling that will become a very frequent thought for me.
I watch the hurricane of a woman break into a light run until we reach the edge of Town. She ducks easily under the fence illuminated with the faint blue glow and heads into the trees.
I follow her into the woods, the towering evergreens nearly the same shade, but infinitely less intense, as her eyes. She quickly locates a small, incredibly clear stream (much clearer and purer looking than any of the water I've ever seen within the Town.
Unlike many others, It *had* occurred to me to just... come out here. And I had. Many times. It is beautiful and peaceful and I have no reason to fear the Feral. I can handle myself.
*"There is no reason to leave the Town"*
I am unsure why those words pop into my head right then, the words we are told many times over as children.
While it is not directly among the Forbidden, it is frowned upon by the Overseers (upon the Royalle's request), and that ideology is enforced by the Feral Ones that lurk in the unoccupied spaces surrounding the Towns; the vaguely human beings who refused the comforts of the New Instatement and chose to retreat into our unused lands.
I wonder how Erin became so comfortable in this place.
She slows to a brisk walk after a while, taking sure, determined steps over the pebbling, grassy bank, her boot's crunching accompanying the sounds of birds and other creatures.
We travel in silence for a while before she speaks again.
"What are you?" she asks me as she brushes aside a pine branch, ducking to avoid the needles. Some of the wild strands catch one anyway and I pluck it out.
"I'm Holland," I remind her. "I'm among the Conicious-"
"I mean what *are* you?" she presses.
I realize she means more than my name, more than my class.
"I... I'm an artist," I tell her. My sketches have always been a large part of who I am.
She smiles beautifully as she spins a circle to face me. "I'm a dancer," she tells me. I am not surprised.
"Where are we going?" I ask.
"You'll see," she says with a smirk as she turns and run into the trees. I hurry after her, unwilling to let her leave my sight. I watch as she elegantly leaps up onto a fallen tree, running up its length and jumping off the end, catching a branch in her fall (or more of a flight, really) and swinging onto the ground on the other side of the now much wider stream.
I steel myself as I prepare to follow her actions, breathing even and hard as I charge up the log, catch the branch... and ove-rotate, landing humiliatingly on my ass.
She throws her head back in that musical laugh and I smirk up at her.
"What?" she asks.
"You look damn fine from down here, that's what."
I swear she blushes a bit before extending her hand to me, helping me up.
It isn't long before we arrive in a sandy, rocky clearing with a few people in strange attire milling around, a few booths selling oddities and things that are most assuredly Forbidden, and an ornately arched building sitting across from us. I feel my eyes light up as I take it in.
It is amazing.
Erin catches my smile and grins in return, taking my hand.
"You haven't seen the half of it yet," she tells me before guiding me through the crowd and into the building. It looks like a library of sorts, but the books are bound in leather and contain paper. I look around as she pulls me along, trying to determine what may be hidden within the thousands of volumes on the towering shelves, but Erin takes me behind one of the shelves, dropping to her knees and drawing a small knife from her boot.
My eyes widen as she slices the tip of her finger and begins drawing a pattern in the blood.
A moment later, a hatch on the door slides open and she stands, facing me once more.
"Follow me, Holland." She smiles devilishly as she holds out her arms and falls backwards into the hole.

[Lithium by Evanescence?](https://www.google.com/url?sa=t rct=j q= esrc=s source=web cd=1 cad=rja uact=8 ved=0ahUKEwiVkKvXh_TNAhUBdSYKHcCBC1kQyCkIITAA url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DPJGpsL_XYQI usg=AFQjCNFLits0c6ErlP0qfrQSHNj042cCsQ sig2=afRrzhQyrVKdKDSDz6jvLg)
On it (:

I watch the lean, tall figure dashing through the crowd, her fiery hair trailing behind her as she nimbly leaps over a crate.
"Shit!" I swear as I force myself faster. I can't lose sight of her. She's got my whole day's earnings under her arm.
Damn pickpockets.
I chase after her, my breathes coming in ragged gasps. I may be in good shape but she's getting away like she's a fish in the waves.
I'm about to give up in frustration when I see my chance.
Ha. She doesn't know her way around.
I dash through a side street and throw myself around the corner, tackling her to the ground as she rounds it. She kicks me off and tries to run but I'm on my feet too fast. I snag her around her waist and lift her up so she can't get any traction.
"Get off me!" She screams.
"Give me my money!"
Her elbow connects with my jaw and I drop her. I've barely righted myself when her tiny fist slams into my cheek.
I gasp and spit out a bit of blood before reaching for her arm. I catch it and twist it up behind her back. Without missing a beat, she throws her legs off the ground and slams her feet into my abdomen. I grunt in pain and drop her. A moment later her foot hits my side and I'm on the ground.
Another swift kick catches my ribs and I cry out as I grab her ankle and pull her to the ground. I pin her down with my legs and go to secure her wrists but she reacts too fast, throwing another punch into my face. And another. And another.
She ends the attack with a sharp knee to my chest and throws me aside, getting up to run.
It's as our hands brush in the scuffle that I feel it.
They always told me that it was something you couldn't describe, but that you would know it when you feel it.
I didn't believe them, but now... that's the only explanation.
This is my soulmate.
And she must feel it too.
Her blazing green eyes meet mine as she turns back to face me, and her lush lips part slightly in a silent gasp.
My resolve is renewed and I use all my energy to catcher by her wrist in one hand, her waist in the other.
It's no longer about getting my money back. I cannot let her get away, not know that we are tied together by the Cosmos.
"What's your name?" I demand as I meet her eyes.
She looks defiant, untamable. "The fuck is it you?"
"I think you know," I whisper.
Her eyes widen a little more and I feel her breathing get faster.
"...Erin." she answers after a moment.
"Holland," I give her my own name.
She nods, her pointed chin raised. "It seems we've met an odd twist."
"Indeed."
"What are we to do now?"
"Well... first I'd like my wallet back."
She laughs, a musical, whole laugh. "You'll have to take it from me then."
With those words, she whirls out of my grasp and takes off down the street.
I will find her.

"Who the hell are you?" I demand, my hands shaking around the rope that was meant to be my demise. I was plotting how to get it up around the ceiling fan with this guy suddenly stepped out of fucking *nowhere*, seemingly materializing out of the shadow of my bookcase.
"I'm your damnation," the tall, broad-shouldered man responded, a slight smirk gracing his face.
I feel my eyes widen and my breaths quicken. "What are you on about? Why are you in my house?"
"Because it's my job to make sure you never leave it again," he tells me his voice dark and low.
My breathing comes in gasps for a moment more before they slow and calm, and I find myself laughing.
His face turns from smug to confused. He frowns slightly and one eyebrow arches. "Just *what* is so funny to you about this?" he asks, his tone icy.
I giggle manically a moment more before holding my hand over my mouth, quieting myself. "*I'm* supposed to be my damnation. With this." I hold up the rope for demonstration.
He looks taken aback. "*Why?*"
"Because I'm done," I say, my eyes welling with tears. "I'm just done. I haven't felt alive since I was a kid. I started dying the day my parents did. I should have died in the crash too but some sick bastard decided I needed to see a little more pain first. A little more pain disguised as a reprieve from it. He promised to stay by my side, and he did. Oh lord, did he stay by me. Suffocatingly close to make sure I never got away, couldn't run from him. All his words, his touch, his presence, things once so passionate and loving that turned toxic, breaking me down with each strike, each jab, each look at me. Like I was a cockroach instead of his 'lover.'"" I sneer the last word.
His face turns dark and troubled, almost imperceptibly angry. "You want to *die* because of what some shitbag did?" he seems like the idea is just so damn crazy.
"You want to kill me because..." I was ready to retort but I realized I don't know why.
"Because some shitbag payed me," he answers with a smile.
I take an involuntary step back. "Your a hitman?" My voice wavers.
He takes several quick, graceful steps forward. I glare defiantly as he hooks my chin with his fingers, guiding my face up. I resist the urge to pull my head away.
"That's right, sweetheart," he croons. His face is so close to my ear I can *feel* the words and it sends an odd shiver of excitement through me.
*This man is going to kill me.*
And that excites me.
That, and his warmth, his *delicious* scent, his smoldering eyes...
"Then get it over with," I snip, raising my chin a bit.
"Hmm..." he makes a face as he thinks. "No."
"No?" I demand, offended. "*No?*"
"No," he clarifies again.
"Why *not*?"
"Because you've got more living to do." There is mischief in his eyes as he looks me over.
"Says who?" I scoff
"Says me." His tone darkens.
I find myself nodding helplessly.
"Now..." he begins, making a gesture with his finger. "Let's destroy the fucker who took the light from your eyes."
As if in a trance, I follow the tall man out the front door, strolling out into the night with a purpose I have not felt in six months and three days.
I am going to destroy the one who ruined me.

Thank you for acknowledging that. It honestly makes my day every time someone acknowledges that female on female sexual assault is a thing. As a victim of that kind of assault I hear far too often that it's not real, so the recognition is just... amazing.
Thank you.
Thanks (:

WRITING.TITLE: Split persceptive narrative
WRITING.TEXT:
I've been working on a novel that is currently twenty-nine chapters long at 139 pages. It follows a couple of characters but it's in the first-person, and who that first-person is changes frequently between them.
My question is about how I don't really have any pattern as to when I switch perspective. It usually alternates by chapter but sometimes I switch within or do a couple in a row from the same perspective.
Will that make it choppy or interrupt the flow?
Thank you so much! I fixed it up a little... [does it flow better now?](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gXdMlXEl2KUdcCNxeQnAodmfD-O40crumcIAtfNeIp4/edit?usp=sharing)

* Intoxicated * unsure. * 557 * General impression * [Google Docs link](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gXdMlXEl2KUdcCNxeQnAodmfD-O40crumcIAtfNeIp4/edit?usp=sharing)
This is just my first chapter or prologue... I've got 81 more pages in sixteen more chapters so far if anyone's interested in seeing the rest. I've been working on it a lot lately and it's been eating away at me, wondering if it's any good. My main concern is that it's just... boring and mundane, unremarkable. I truly appreciate any critique.

I eat nothing but junk food and I'm very thin. It is not what you eat. It's how much. It really infuriates me that there are people who think an ounce of chocolate will make you fat and that a pound of veggies will magically burn fat. It's just so rediculous.

WRITING.TITLE: I never know what to say when I get bingoed.
WRITING.TEXT:
Half of my choice is vanity and the other half is because I'm broken...
Sometimes I think I want a baby. Sometimes I think I want to be a stay-at-home mother. But then I remember I wouldn't be able to handle it. I spend most of my day sobbing and having flashbacks (yay sexual assault! /s). I think about how I'd be looked at and touched in intimate areas by doctors and such during hours of labor. I think about how if the child was female I'd never be able to bond with it.
And then I also think that I love my body too much to ruin it with a baby. I don't want stretch marks, loose skin, thin hair, I don't want to gain weight. I don't want my tits getting all stretched out and saggy.
This is why I don't know what to say when people bingo me. I don't want to tell them I am broken or that I am shallow. Because that's it. I don't have some reason like "I want to dedicate myself to charity" or "I have a genetic disorder that would hurt my baby". I just don't want my body messed up and and mind is too messed up already to handle it. It sounds pathetic. And I feel like it proves them right. That there's something wrong with being childfree. But I know there isn't. It's a valid life choice. But I don't want them to think I'm just too broken to "fulfill" my life.
*sigh*
They deleted that but not all the obese people stuffing their faces? That's so hypocritical. Do they not even realize that fat is unhealthy?

WRITING.TITLE: [Serious] Redditors who are close with their parents: what's it like?

WRITING.TEXT: *internet-hugs back* Thank you so much for being so nice.

It's just the reasons I've previously said...I'm angry and hateful instead of sweet and loving, I'm ugly not beautiful, and I'm not *me*. I'm impure and I have no one close to me, no relationships. I'm lonely and I never do anything and I'm broken. And I didn't protect myself from being violated or abused.

I've been trying and I've lost 15 pounds so far...it's just not enough yet.
And I know the cells get replaced by the body is essentially the same. Looks the same...feels the same. It will always be known :(
Exercise is always counterproductive to me because it makes me too hungry.
And the yummy food is a problem because everything I like is high calorie and k want tons of it so I have to purge...
I'm working towards it it's just not possible in a healthy way for me. That's not really the problem though, the problem is that I presently hate myself and my body isn't safe and my own.
I hope you have a good night as well. Thank you.
Thank you.

But everyday I'm fat and have short hair is a day I'm not me, a day lost, and it will always be shorter than it should be. And my body still won't ever be clean again, because of the assault...
And I'm truly just too lazy and weak to lose weight in a healthy way. I want yummy food and instant results...and I also don't want visible muscles.
And my hair grows super slow. It's gonna be at least 3 years before it's even *ok*, at least 5 before it's pretty :(
There wasn't anyone else... And I have no where to find friends /( I don't know what to do.

The only person I've ever been close with left me for that exact reason :(
I know I can't make a wish, I just really want to not be used. It's more regret. And it's not that I'm prudish and don't like sex (that's not the case, I always wanted it, just not with some pervert who was like 15 years older than me at least and most importantly was not my partner and did it to me against my will), I just wanted to always only have one person know me in that way. Only one. For my first to be my last. I guess sickly enough that is kind of going to be true, as being violated ruined any chance of me ever being able to handle that. So I'll never get to be with anyone consensually...
It feels like it's the end of me...And it really did end my love because he left me for how I was acting over it. It ruined me and made him hate me because of what I became

Yeah, I mean that weigh more than I look :/
And yeah that's basically it, my body which meant so much to me was invaded and made ugly, so that's why I don't feel like me. And I really always feel dissociated. probably because of the trauma...
The only person I've ever been close with Hayes me though. He doesn't want to be in my life anymore. Because I'm broken and not me...

Short hair is hideous on me. And it only grows like 3 inches per 6 months. It will be years before I'm pretty again and I'll never be as pretty as I should be, because I'll always be missing those 10 inches of hair.
I'm short, so I've only gained 30 pounds, but it looks like 50. Also I'm completely skinny fat so while I technically have a healthy weight I look super chubby. No thigh gap. No flat stomach. In disgusting. It's a lot of why I don't feel like me anymore.
And *I* said that can't look fat and have short hair and be beautiful. It's not possible for me. I'm only pretty with long hair. And I'm not *me* with short hair.

I'm just longing for me. I long for my purity and long hair. I long to feel like myself instead of completely dissociated.
And what do you mean by someone I've fallen out with?

A get was s typo...I meant angry.
And I really am ugly now. My abusers cut my hair (making me ugly) and also I'm fat now (making me even more ugly) :(
No one anymore.

I'm angry because my life got ruined when everything was perfect. I was perfectly physically and mentally, happy and beautiful beyond what words could ever tell, and then I was forced into the facility where I was violated. I didn't save myself. I didn't realize that I was being violated until it was too late. I'm angry because that person now has intimate knowledge of my body. I'm angry ecause that person stole my purity. I hate everything because no one cares about me and I can't get the help I need and because bad things happen and because of those bad things I can't be happy anymore. I was made ugly. I was made impure. I lost my future.
I don't know how to get help. I just want to feel better...

WRITING.TITLE: My only reason to live hates me
WRITING.TEXT:
He hates me now. My lover. My best friend. My everything.
Well...a year and a half ago I was sexually assaulted. That happened while I was in an inpatient facility for eating disorders. That's when we started to lose it. I had flashbacks and hated myself and my body. I wasn't the happy, lovely, sweet girl he fell in love with anymore. I hated the world and myself and being alive.
Soon after that I was forced to live away from home with a different relative and they turned out to be abusive...beat me, creeped on me, threw away all my things, held me down and cut my hair from my waist to my chin, and isolated me from everyone. Put me on homeschool, took away all access to phones or email or anything. I wasn't allowed to talk to anyone or leave the house.
He thought I'd killed myself. I couldn't talk to anyone during the 10 months I lived with the abusers. I just disappeared.
And in that time I feel like I lost myself. I feel like I stated dying after I was violated and then the 10 months of abuse completely killed me.
I don't feel like me anymore. I don't act like me anymore.
I miss myself. The pretty girl with long long hair. The innocent pure girl who had never been seen without clothes on or touched beyond hugs and brushes in crowds. The sweet girl who loves everyone and everything. I one who wants to be a nurse so she can help people.
Now I'm angry and I hate everything. I am not beautiful. I'm not pure...my body is used. Stripped and displayed and touched all over. I can't be kind anymore. I just want to be dead.
He broke up with me because I'm gone. The real me is gone. He told me not to talk to him until I'm me again. It was such a big fight. I needed to talk about what happened. He hates that. He told me I'm insane and belong in a mental hospital. He told me he hates me. He said everyone hates me. He said I'm crazy.
I just want to be her again.
I feel like death is the only thing I can do. I can't ever be happy again. I'm broken...
Maybe some crazy women poked holes in the condoms. Maybe he was raped. Maybe she lied about being on the pill. There are situations in which it wouldn't be his fault.

I know it's fair for her to have the right to abort and I don't think you're pro-life. I don't know how you decided I thought that. I just think that father's should be able to as well. I only brought up rape to ask if you really think there is no disruption in which a father should be able abort responsibility. There are situations in which it wouldn't be "the consequences of his actions".
How so? How is he obligated to a life he didn't intentionally create?
If he didn't choose to have a kid he has no responsibility to it.
The mother can feed and clothe it if she wants to keep it. And what about in cases of rape? Maybe someone *did* force them to insert their unprotected penis into them.

They should. No one should be trapped into a life they don't want or be forced to give anything up for a decision they did not make. It's up to the woman if the child will be born or not. So it should be up to the man to help raise it or not. Women can abort, so why can't men? I, as a woman, don't have to be a parent if I don't want to, so why should men?
I was hoping you'd say...because they'd shit on you.

I have blue hair because I think it's fun...I'm not s rabid feminazi, I don't want men to fear me (I actually just want them to think I'm cute, blue hair aside or included)...but yeah it is nice when small children think I'm some sort of elf.
And fuck these bitches for turning it into anything other than a fashion choice :(
Less than a child? Hmm...I assumed it was a dead child. Is that why it's less? Or is it a part of a child? Or a fetus? I can't stop thinking about it.
Well...it won't be my life because I won't have kids :P

WRITING.TITLE: My Nmother is always accusing me of things
WRITING.TEXT:
She frequently insists that my hair smells like pot, even though I have never smoked pot or anything else, have no transportation or money, and I'm homeschooled so I'm always at my house unless she takes me somewhere. She says my room smells like pot too. Even though I. have. no. pot.
She accuses me of being pregnant:
Me: "Ugh my stomach hurts"
Her: "You're not pregnant are you? I wouldn't put it past you. You could be sneaking boys in while I'm at work, you're alone so often,"
I have never even held someone's hand before.
It's upsetting and demeaning and I hate it.

I've never come this way before
Neither have I. It must be the cobblestones.
The vibrations and motion caused by the cobblestones made the second nun orgasm, so when the first said that she had never come that way, meaning she had never taken that route before, the second assumed she had meant she had orgasmed as well, and attributed it to the cobblestones.
The fact that they are nuns adds to it, as nuns are celibate

But but but...don't you know a child is the property of its parents and has no rights at all!?! it is an extension of the parent and needs constant monitoring to make sure it doesn't do anything evil like have relationships or privacy! /s

The phrase seems so misandrist. I think it should be changed to "assholes will be assholes", not "boys will be boys", because there are plenty of males who are amazing people and plenty of females who are shitty people.

WRITING.TITLE: Allergy Season
WRITING.TEXT:
I snuggled in deeper into my sheets, cold and shivering against the weather and mentally cursing my nonexistent heater. I was not a fan of cold weather and an empty bed.
"At least I don't get allergies", I thought, as my mind wandered to thoughts of my husband with his red, dripping nose, raw from tissues, afflicted by the season. I missed him briefly, reminding myself he would be home soon enough, in three more weeks.
Moments passed and I began to drift, feeling light and content in my empty home, dreamy as my mind began to slip, a sweet sleepy haze falling over me, quieting my mind...
My peace was interrupted by the sound of a sneeze.
Seeing a therepist isn't an option for me right now :/

WRITING.TITLE: Fear of going places due to the possibility of pat-downs
WRITING.TEXT: I am so scared of going to concerts, festivals, airports (*especially* airports) and things like that because I don't want to be searched. I have panic attacks every time I go to such a thing because I don't want to be touched or seen and it's very distressing and I don't know how to handle it. I'm worried I'll never be able to travel again because of this fear. I feel so broken.
*claps hands* Lets pop popcorn over the flames from that epic burn (:

There are *parents* who aren't fit to raise children.
And who are you to judge this sub? And to judge what "right" intensions are?

Yes! I don't want the bingoers to pity me and think I want kids but can't have them...
I want them to know damn well I *choose* not to have children.

Literally- In a literal sense, as opposed to a nonliteral or exaggerated sense
That's *literally* what I meant. I did not use it incorrectly.

WRITING.TITLE: What literally could not have gotten any worse?

WRITING.TEXT: Yes.

Because by then it's an actual baby. It experiences consciousness and such. It's progressed past the collecting mass of cells that merely has the potential to became a baby that it was in the first...I don't know, 20-ish weeks. It actual is a baby after a certain point and then it's not right to kill it, because it would actually be killing it.

It's the bullshit lines closed-minded people preach when they hear someone is childfree- "You'll change your mind", "It's different when they're your own", "But every woman dreams of becoming a mother!", "What if your parents had thought the way you do!?", "You must be so selfish", "Who will take care of you when you're old?" etc.
I hate that she included "cat calling" on the list of dangerous things.

Starvation mode is a myth. What actually happens is that the metabolism slows down. The body can't make more fat out of smaller amounts. It just uses calories slower and "minor" body fictions stop or decline, like maintaining regular body heat or menstruation in females. This will result in a slower weight loss though, also constipation and, odd enough, decrease in appetite.
So what you want isn't a lover, just an incubator?
He broke up with me because I kept bugging him about my emotions about the sexual assault I'd recently experienced.

WRITING.TITLE: What lesser-known urban legend do you know?

WRITING.TEXT: I was also made to see a psychiatrist who spent more time talking to my mother than me. It was bullshit. And I couldn't work with the psychiatrist anyway because she was a woman and my mother kept insisting I had to see her because "it's not safe for a female minor to see a male therapist. Do you want to get molested?". The reason I could talk to the female therapist was because I was molested by a different female.

I was barely a teenager and I was forced into a mental treatment center where I was sexually assaulted by one of the psychiatrists. I entered anorexic (except not really, because I just constantly crash dieted because it was fun and it made me look good. No disordered thoughts, no low self esteem, so self hate, just an over inflated ego) and socially anxious and left suicidal and broken. It's been years and I haven't gone a day without crying, I can't even handle simple things like washing my hair or changing my clothes without breaking down sobbing, I can't have normal relationships, I couldn't finish high school at a real school because of the fear of other females I've had since the assault (things like changing for gym and all of the other things where they segregated the genders so I'd be stuck with only other girls wouldn't be possible for me after it so I couldn't go back), I have constant thoughts of ending my life even all this time later, I hate every inch of my disgusting, violated body that doesn't belong to me and it kills me everyday that the sick fuck who assaulted me knows my body in such initiate ways and that that is how I lost my purity. And the worst is that my family and everyone else thinks I'm happy and fine and that going to the hospital saved me. They don't even know and they would care anyway. I died that day, all they did was ensure my body didn't die with me, for which I will always be angry.

So being afraid of women since I was sexually assaulted by one means I'm a misogynist in the eyes of tumblrina "thatsproblematic". That just...that pisses me off indefinitely. That's so rude. Because I bet a great deal that if I'd been assaulted by a man and therefore was afraid of them "thatsproblematic" would be all sympathy and understanding. Fuck that bitch. I don't think women are inferior or inherently violent because of the assault- they just for make me uneasy. I realize that unease in not rational and that just because one woman was a monster does not mean they all are. I just can't seem to trust them anymore.
But the analogy of vispider was flawless. That's just so accurate and perfectly explained.

This legitimately makes me feel afraid for my independence, security, freedom, and safety, that there people who think like this. These people want to take every single woman alive who actually thinks rationally and turn her into a brainwashed man-hating femizombie. They want to convert us all into angry, hateful, sexist, conservative, conformists with massive victim complexes and no opinions, thoughts, or ideas of our our. They want to take away my own control and authority over my own body and mind and that is terrifying.
They've done the exact opposite of what they were supposed to follow- they are the reason I (another woman) feels afraid.
Alcohol, because I have no self-control or will power and know damn well I'd end up addicted because of my inability to cope with anything and my tendency towards dependency.

Gah! Ok so I slipped into binge eating for about three weeks now and obviously put on some weight from that and I'm now trying to reclaim my body but I *love* eating so I needed support and encouragement to get past this binge urge, so I log on to a site and start chatting with the person I got matched up with and expressed my frustration and wanting to binge and feeling gross and she just kept trying to talk me out of it losing weight and not binging! Like, doesn't "body positive" mean having a positive relationship with your body? In order to do that I need to like the way it looks, and I don't like my body right now. Why did she have to get so combative about my decision? Why do people try to talk others out of losing weight?
Like, literally?!

But...but...but...only icky boys do stupid things! You just hurt my feelz by implying that icky males could think on a rational level! Don't you know, gurlz rule and boys drool!
/s

Thank you so much!
And yeah, my parents wouldn't let me get counseling even if I told them and I can't tell them why I need it and I can't get to a large town or city on my own yet as I can't drive yet and live in a really off-the-map place way off from anywhere else but I'll be able to drive soon and probably could then.
Thank you so much for the help and resources(:

I've been using 7 Cups of Tea for a while, but it doesn't really last if that makes sense. If feel for a few moments after getting all out but it hasn't help me find anyways to overcome it.
Im in high school but it's homeschool, so no guidance counselors.
Thank you very very much, I appreciate the kind words and advice, but seeing a professional isn't an option for me right now. I haven't the funds or means to get it.
